title: UK firefighters respond to around 1,900 incidents a DAY - so one supermarket is saying a special thank you
text:

There are around 41,000 firefighters in Britain. Every day, they play a vital role in saving lives across the nation.

But did you know that, between them, they attended an amazing 694,892 incidents last year?

That works out at roughly 1,900 every single day - an incredible number which illustrates just how much work they do to keep us all safe.

Firefighters are, of course, not the only emergency service workers providing us all with an invaluable service.

There are almost 2 million brave emergency service and Armed Forces workers dedicated to keeping us all protected.

And supermarket Iceland is saying 'thank you' to each and every one of them - with a huge 20% off promotion!

It means the UK's 1.3million NHS staff will be able to cut their shopping bills between 14 and 21 October, along with Britain's 143,500 police officers and the 38,403 prison service staff employed across the country.

The offer is also a huge 'thank you' to Britain's 20,000 ambulance drivers and the 2,250 RNLI staff, as well as the organisation's 9,000 volunteers.

The UK's 191,600 Armed Forces personnel will also be able to receive the discount, available at any Iceland or Food Warehouse store.

In total 31 emergency services qualify for the offer, including the Red Cross, Prison Service, HM Coastguard and Mountain Rescue.

To claim the discount, shoppers will simply need a valid Blue Light Card or valid Emergency Services identification which they can present at the checkout.

Iceland's Founder and Executive Chairman Malcolm Walker CBE hailed the nation's hero workers as he announced the special offer, saying: "Like everyone else, I am in awe of the amazing work undertaken by our emergency services.

"You are the people we all rely on when the going gets too tough for the rest of us."

"So we’d like to say a big “thank you” to all those whose work is dedicated to saving and protecting the lives of others, whether that is in the ambulance service or the wider NHS, Police Service, Prison Service, Fire Service, NHS, Ambulance Service, HM Coastguard, Mountain Rescue or RNLI and also Armed Forces."

This offer will be honoured in over 950 Iceland and The Food Warehouse stores throughout the UK.

Thirty-one emergency services are valid for this discount via the Blue Light Card. To see who’s eligible click here . Terms and conditions apply to the Iceland offer. See Iceland.co.uk/emergency-services for details.
description: Iceland are saying thanks to Britain's brave emergency service workers and members of the the Armed Forces with a special offer just for them
